column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I would definitely suggest to check-in on foursquare as you get a free pintxo. Throughout all the times I've been for dinner
column2: I've learned you can never go without their red sangria. You don't realize it at first
column4: it does you in for the night. The tortilla
column6: esp for that damn good sauce)
column9: the calamari and octopus are all phenomenal.
